title: Bloodrender
content:
Bloodrender Effect Deal additional damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus. On a successful hit, you gain Bloodrender, which lets you deal more damage at the cost of some hit points. Action

Deal additional damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus. On a successful hit, you gain Bloodrender, which lets you deal more damage at the cost of some hit points.

Bloodrender is a Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Bloodrender is an ability unique to some weapons that allows you to exchange life to deal more damage.
